Here is the list of astrological signs and their scores based on various aspects:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Natural-born leaders, Aries are known for their boldness and enthusiasm.
2. Taurus - 6/10 - Practical and reliable, Taurus are grounded in reality.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Versatile and communicative, Geminis excel at multitasking.
4. Cancer - 7/10 - Emotional and nurturing, Cancers prioritize family and connection.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, Leos shine bright with their natural charm.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Analytical and detail-oriented, Virgos are perfectionists at heart.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomatic and social, Librans seek balance and harmony in all aspects.
8. Scorpio - 5/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpios are private and reserved, but fiercely loyal.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians seek freedom and exploration.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Disciplined and responsible, Capricorns strive for success through hard work.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian and unconventional, Aquarians are visionaries with a strong sense of justice.
12. Pisces - 9/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, Pisces are dreamers with a deep connection to the universe.
Note: Scores are subjective and based on general astrological characteristics associated with each sign.
